body.p:
Before removing Couchbase Server, do the following:
Shutdown Couchbase Server.
If your machine is part of an active cluster, rebalance the cluster to take the node out of the configuration.
Update clients to point to an available node within the Couchbase Server cluster.
To uninstall on Mac OS X:

ol.li: Open the Applications folder, and then drag the Couchbase Server application to the trash. If required, provide administrator credentials to complete the deletion.
Delete the Couchbase folder from the ~/Library/Application Support folder for the user that ran Couchbase Server. This operation removes the application data.
